activity: Sunrise View at St. Lambert's Church
description: Enjoy a quiet morning watching the sunrise over the historic St. Lambert's Church in Münster.

locationInfo.description: A peaceful spot in Münster's old town with historical significance and great early morning views.
safetyTips: Dress warmly for the early morning chill.
Watch your step on cobbled streets.
Be mindful of early morning cyclists.

description: Take a short walk around the Baroque Erbdrostenhof and grab a coffee at a nearby café.

locationInfo.description: A short city walk to admire one of Münster's finest Baroque buildings with a café stop.
safetyTips: Wear comfortable shoes for city walking.
Be cautious of traffic when crossing streets.
Stay aware of cyclists, as bike lanes are common.

description: Enjoy a short walk through the Münster Botanical Garden and admire the seasonal flowers.

locationInfo.description: A refreshing and peaceful garden walk with a variety of plants and flowers.
safetyTips: Stay on designated paths to protect plant life.
Avoid touching rare or protected plant species.

description: Relax by the Werse River with a short walk along the riverside trail.

locationInfo.description: A peaceful riverside walk with benches for short breaks and scenic water views.
safetyTips: Watch out for cyclists on shared trails.
Be careful of uneven ground near the river.
Carry a small snack or drink for a relaxing break.

description: A brief stroll down Pferdegasse, a charming street known for its local boutiques and atmosphere.

locationInfo.description: A short but delightful walk through one of Münster's vibrant shopping streets.
safetyTips: Be aware of pedestrian traffic in busy areas.
Check out local stores for unique finds.
Stay mindful of cyclists passing through.
